problems.title: Clients Can't Open Your Deliverables
problems.description: Your clients don't understand your 3D surveys through static PDFs. They need special software to see your data and miss the full value of your work.

faq.title:
Frequently Asked
Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about View4Sight platform.

formats.question: What file formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support all major point cloud formats including LAS, E57, PLY, as well as IFC, DXF, and orthophoto formats. Files are automatically optimized for web viewing.

storage.question: How much storage do I get?
storage.answer: Our plans range from 15GB for the free Starter plan to unlimited storage for Enterprise customers. All data is hosted in French data centers.

sharing.question: How does project sharing work?
sharing.answer: Create secure, password-protected links to share projects with clients or team members. Control access levels and track viewing activity.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade security with French data hosting, GDPR compliance, and ISO 27001 certification. Your data never leaves France.

main_features.title:
Everything You Need
in One Platform
main_features.subtitle: Upload, explore, measure, share without switching tools. View4Sight combines everything you need to handle, secure, and deliver geospatial data.

web_viewer.title: Explore Large 3D Files, Right in Your Browser
web_viewer.description: Open massive point clouds and BIM models instantly without any installations. Whether you're on site or in the office, your data is ready to view, measure, and share.

all_formats.title: All Major Geospatial Formats, Seamlessly Integrated
all_formats.description: View, align and combine LAS, E57, IFC, DXF, orthophotos and more — with built-in coordinate system handling. Forget format headaches, just upload and go.

data_security.title: Total Control Over Your Data
data_security.description: Manage user roles, restrict access, and track activity — all with enterprise-grade encryption and French data hosting. Your data stays protected, and always under your control.

smart_annotations.title: Annotate & Measure Directly in 3D
smart_annotations.description: Add comments, dimensions, and statuses that stick to real geometry. Everyone sees the same thing, in real-time.

video_demo.title: How It Works
video_demo.description: The platform is designed to help you visualize, automate, and build geospatial data workflows.

faq_short.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_short.subtitle: Get answers to the most common questions about View4Sight's 3D visualization platform, data security, and geospatial file handling.

items.question: What file formats do you support?
items.answer: All major geospatial formats including LAS, LAZ, E57, PLY for point clouds; IFC, DWG, DXF for BIM; TIFF, GeoTIFF for orthophotos; and 360° imagery formats.

items.question: How do you handle large datasets?
items.answer: Our streaming technology optimizes data delivery. Files are processed server-side and streamed efficiently to browsers, handling multi-gigabyte datasets smoothly.

items.question: Can I control who sees my data?
items.answer: Absolutely. Granular access controls let you set viewing permissions, download restrictions, and project-specific access for each collaborator.

items.question: What about data sovereignty?
items.answer: Your data is hosted on French servers with ISO 27001 certification. We also offer on-premise installations for complete control.

items.question: Do I need to install software?
items.answer: No installation required. View4Sight runs entirely in your web browser, making it accessible from any device with an internet connection.

items.question: How much storage do I get?
items.answer: Our free plan includes 150GB of storage. Professional plans offer unlimited storage with additional collaboration features.

security_block.title:
Your Data Stays Where It
Belongs: In France
security_block.subtitle: While others send your data abroad, View4Sight keeps it home. ISO certified, GDPR native, public sector approved.

features.title: Sovereign Hosting
features.description: Your files are stored in certified French datacenters. No foreign routing, ever.

features.title: On-premise Option

features.title: Granular Permissions
features.description: Set precise access rights and monitor every action. Ideal for audits and traceability.

features.title: GDPR Compliance
features.description: Full compliance with European regulations from day one. No add-ons, no surprises.

faqs.question: How do I upload my first 3D dataset?
faqs.answer: Simply go to your dashboard, click 'New Project', drag and drop your files (LAS, E57, IFC, etc.), and our platform will automatically process them. The upload supports files up to 20GB depending on your plan.

faqs.question: What file formats are supported?
faqs.answer: View4Sight supports all major 3D formats including LAS, E57, IFC, DXF, PLY, and ORTHO imagery. We also support various survey and point cloud formats from leading hardware manufacturers.

faqs.question: How do I share my 3D data with clients?
faqs.answer: You can generate secure shareable links with custom permissions. Go to your project, click 'Share', set viewing permissions, and send the link. Recipients don't need an account to view your data.

faqs.question: Can I measure distances and volumes in the viewer?
faqs.answer: Yes! Use our built-in measurement tools to calculate distances, areas, volumes, and create cross-sections. All measurements are precise and can be exported for documentation.

faqs.question: How do I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Billing in your dashboard. You can change plans anytime. Upgrades take effect immediately, downgrades at the next billing cycle. No data is lost during plan changes.

faqs.question: Is my data secure and where is it stored?
faqs.answer: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. We use French data centers and are fully GDPR compliant. You maintain full ownership of your data and can delete it anytime.

faqs.question: Can I integrate View4Sight with my existing tools?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide a comprehensive REST API and webhooks for custom integrations. Popular integrations include CAD software, survey equipment, and project management tools.

hero.title:
Visualize Massive 3D Projects.
Online, Seamlessly.
hero.subtitle:
Stream multi-gigabyte point clouds directly in your browser.
No plugins, no downloads, no performance compromises.

features.title: Massive Files. Instant Loading.
features.description: Display multi-gigabyte point clouds and 3D models without downsampling or plugins. Navigate, rotate, and zoom smoothly even on a low-end laptop.

features.title: One Unified Space for All Your Data
features.description: Overlay point clouds, BIM, orthophotos, 360° photos, and CAD in a single scene. Compare as-designed vs as-built, track changes over time, and validate surveys without multiple exports.

features.title: Visit the Site in Immersive View
features.description: Switch to first-person view to explore corridors, levels, and terrains with simple controls. The feeling of being on-site, without travel.

features.title: All Your Formats, Ready to Visualize
features.description: Native support for LAS/LAZ, E57, IFC, DXF, OBJ, etc. No conversions. No surprises. Upload and visualize data exactly as captured.

meta.title: Measure - View4Sight | Surveying Precision in Your Browser
meta.description: Centimeter-accurate 3D measurements on point clouds, meshes, and BIM. Distances, areas, volumes, sections, and profiles calculated reproducibly for your inspections.

hero.title: Surveying Precision, in 3D and in Your Browser
hero.subtitle: Measure on point clouds, meshes, and BIM, where your data lives. Instant sections and profiles, readable deviations based on your tolerances, classification with legends ready for reporting.

features.title: Measure Everything in 3D
features.description: Take measurements directly on your data: lengths, areas, and volumes, without leaving the 3D scene. Check wall lengths, slab areas, or cut-and-fill volumes, for example.

features.title: On-the-Fly Sections and Profiles
features.description: Create elevation sections and profiles on-the-fly, orthogonal or freeform, aligned with your axes and levels. Measure slopes, thicknesses, and local deviations without pre-processing or exports.

features.title: Integrated Surveying Controls
features.description: Check flatness, deviations, and tolerances directly in the scene. Deviation maps and exports ready for your reports.

features.title: Classify and Highlight by Type
features.description: Add attributes to objects, group by class, and generate clear legends for immediate understanding across teams.

meta.title: Collaborate - View4Sight | Real-Time 3D Collaboration
meta.description: No more emails, photos, and crossed versions. One unified scene and centralized comments to work faster, without confusion.

hero.title: One Scene, One Version
hero.subtitle: No more emails, photos, and crossed versions. One unified scene and centralized comments to work faster, without confusion.

features.title: Work Together in Real-Time
features.description: Collaborate on the same scene with live cursors and actions. The entire team navigates, measures, and comments simultaneously, without version conflicts or attachments.

features.title: Comments Anchored to Data
features.description: Add annotations and markups that remain anchored to the exact point in 3D space. Ideal for site visits, punch lists, and progress tracking.

features.title: Share via a Simple Link
features.description: Share your 3D model or digital twin as easily as a YouTube or Google Docs link. No installation, no training required.

features.title: Design and Reality, Side by Side
features.description: Overlay BIM and as-built to detect deviations early, reduce rework, and maintain project progress.

meta.title: Security - View4Sight | Secure and Sovereign Data
meta.description: While others send your data abroad, View4Sight keeps it home. ISO certified, GDPR native, public sector approved.

hero.title: Your Data Stays Secure and Sovereign
hero.subtitle: While others send your data abroad, View4Sight keeps it home. ISO certified, GDPR native, public sector approved.

features.title: Hosting in France
features.description: Your projects remain under French jurisdiction. Hosted in France on ISO/IEC 27001 certified infrastructure, GDPR compliant.

features.title: Advanced Access Controls
features.description: Define permissions for each role: read, measure, edit, download. Controlled and revocable sharing links, and detailed audit logs tracking every action.

features.title: Self-Hosting When Needed
features.description: Deploy View4Sight on your own servers or in your private cloud for maximum control and isolated environments.

features.title: Export Anytime
features.description: Your data belongs to you. Export your raw or processed datasets whenever you want. No lock-in.
